documents.title: Casualty Loss Amount
documents.text:
§165. Losses
(a) General rule.—There shall be allowed as a deduction any loss sustained
during the taxable year and not compensated for by insurance or otherwise.

(b) Amount of deduction.—For purposes of subsection (a), the following rules
shall apply:
  (1) The loss of an individual shall be limited to the loss sustained during
  the taxable year of any one single occurrence with respect to each such
  occurrence by $100 or the loss sustained, whichever is the smaller; and
  (2) In the case of a loss described in paragraph (1), the aggregate of the
  losses in a taxable year shall be limited to the excess of such losses over
  10 percent of adjusted gross income.

(h) Federally declared disasters.—In the case of any loss the primary
personal residence is located in an area designated by the Federal Government
as a disaster area, paragraph (b) shall not apply.
documents.code:
text: """
§165. Losses
(a) General rule.—There shall be allowed as a deduction any loss sustained
during the taxable year and not compensated for by insurance or otherwise.

(b) Amount of deduction.—For purposes of subsection (a), the following rules
shall apply:
  (1) The loss of an individual shall be limited to the loss sustained during
  the taxable year of any one single occurrence with respect to each such
  occurrence by $100 or the loss sustained, whichever is the smaller; and
  (2) In the case of a loss described in paragraph (1), the aggregate of the
  losses in a taxable year shall be limited to the excess of such losses over
  10 percent of adjusted gross income.

(h) Federally declared disasters.—In the case of any loss the primary
personal residence is located in an area designated by the Federal Government
as a disaster area, paragraph (b) shall not apply.
"""

# 26 USC 165(b)(1) - Per-event floor
parameter casualty_loss_floor:
  description: "Per-event floor on individual casualty losses"
  unit: USD
  values:
    2018-01-01: 100
    1998-01-01: 500
    1991-01-01: 100

# 26 USC 165(b)(2) - AGI threshold rate
parameter agi_floor_rate:
  description: "AGI threshold rate for aggregate casualty losses"
  unit: /1
  values:
    1984-01-01: 0.10

input casualty_loss_amount:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Casualty Loss Amount"
  description: "Loss from a single casualty or theft event before applying floor"
  default: 0

input adjusted_gross_income:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Adjusted Gross Income"
  description: "AGI per 26 USC 62"
  default: 0

input federally_declared_disaster:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "Federally Declared Disaster"
  description: "Whether loss is in a federally declared disaster area per 26 USC 165(h)"
  default: false

variable casualty_loss_per_event:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Casualty Loss Per Event"
  description: "Loss from a single casualty or theft event after applying $100 floor per 26 USC §165(b)(1)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Individual loss limited by the $100 floor
    # Loss is the lesser of: actual loss amount or loss sustained minus floor
    if casualty_loss_amount <= 0:
      return 0
    return max(casualty_loss_amount - casualty_loss_floor, 0)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Loss exceeds floor - deductible amount"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        casualty_loss_amount: 1_500
      expect: 1400
    - name: "Loss below floor - no deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        casualty_loss_amount: 75
      expect: 0
    - name: "Loss equals floor - no deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        casualty_loss_amount: 100
      expect: 0

variable total_casualty_loss_before_agi_limit:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Total Casualty Loss Before AGI Limitation"
  description: "Sum of all casualty losses from multiple events after $100 floor but before 10% AGI limitation per 26 USC §165(b)(2)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Sum all casualty losses from multiple events in the year
    # Each event was already subject to the $100 floor
    return sum(casualty_loss_per_event)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Multiple casualty events"
      inputs:
        casualty_loss_per_event: [500, 800, 300]
      expect: 1600
    - name: "Single casualty event"
      inputs:
        casualty_loss_per_event: [1_200]
      expect: 1200
    - name: "No casualty losses"
      inputs:
        casualty_loss_per_event: []
      expect: 0

variable casualty_loss_deduction:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Casualty Loss Deduction"
  description: "Deductible casualty and theft loss limited by 10% AGI floor per 26 USC §165(b)(2), except for federally declared disasters per §165(h)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # If in federally declared disaster area, no AGI limitation applies
    if federally_declared_disaster:
      return total_casualty_loss_before_agi_limit
    # Otherwise, apply 10% AGI floor to aggregate losses
    agi_threshold = adjusted_gross_income * agi_floor_rate
    aggregate_losses = total_casualty_loss_before_agi_limit
    if aggregate_losses <= agi_threshold:
      return 0
    return aggregate_losses - agi_threshold
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Standard case - losses exceed 10% AGI threshold"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 50_000
        total_casualty_loss_before_agi_limit: 8_000
        federally_declared_disaster: false
      expect: 3000
    - name: "Standard case - losses below 10% AGI threshold"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 100_000
        total_casualty_loss_before_agi_limit: 5_000
        federally_declared_disaster: false
      expect: 0
    - name: "Federally declared disaster - no AGI limitation"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 100_000
        total_casualty_loss_before_agi_limit: 3_000
        federally_declared_disaster: true
      expect: 3000

documents.title: MACRS Depreciation
documents.text:
(a) GENERAL RULE.—Except as otherwise provided in this section, the
depreciation deduction provided by section 167(a) for any tangible property
shall be determined by using—
(1) the applicable depreciation method,
(2) the applicable recovery period, and
(3) the applicable convention.
documents.code:
text: """
(a) GENERAL RULE.—Except as otherwise provided in this section, the
depreciation deduction provided by section 167(a) for any tangible property
shall be determined by using—
(1) the applicable depreciation method,
(2) the applicable recovery period, and
(3) the applicable convention.
"""
variable depreciation:
  entity: Asset
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "MACRS Depreciation"
  description: "Total depreciation deduction under Section 168"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    if current_year < year_placed_in_service: return 0  # Not yet placed in service
    return current_year - year_placed_in_service + 1
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "First year of depreciation"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        year_placed_in_service: 2024
        current_year: 2024
      expect: 1  # First depreciation year
    - name: "Second year of depreciation"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        year_placed_in_service: 2023
        current_year: 2024
      expect: 2  # Second depreciation year
    - name: "Asset not yet placed in service"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        year_placed_in_service: 2025
        current_year: 2024
      expect: 0  # No depreciation before placed in service
    - name: "Fifth year of 5-year property"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        year_placed_in_service: 2020
        current_year: 2024
      expect: 5  # Fifth depreciation year
    - name: "Tenth year for 7-year property"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        year_placed_in_service: 2015
        current_year: 2024
      expect: 10  # Tenth year (may exceed recovery period)
    - name: "Asset placed in service years ago"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        year_placed_in_service: 2010
        current_year: 2024
      expect: 15  # Fifteenth depreciation year

documents.title: Charitable Contribution Deduction
documents.text:
(1) General rule.-- There shall be allowed as a deduction any charitable
contribution (as defined in subsection (c)) payment of which is made
within the taxable year. A charitable contribution shall be allowable
as a deduction only if verified under regulations prescribed by the
Secretary.
documents.code:
text: """
(1) General rule.-- There shall be allowed as a deduction any charitable
contribution (as defined in subsection (c)) payment of which is made
within the taxable year. A charitable contribution shall be allowable
as a deduction only if verified under regulations prescribed by the
Secretary.
"""
variable charitable_deduction:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Charitable Contribution Deduction"
  description: "Total deductible charitable contributions for itemized deductions per 26 USC 170(a)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Total deduction = current year + carryforward used
    return charitable_deduction_before_carryforward + charitable_carryforward_used
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Current year contributions only - typical donor"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        charitable_deduction_before_carryforward: 5_000
        charitable_carryforward_used: 0
      expect: 5_000

    - name: "Carryforward only - no current year contributions"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        charitable_deduction_before_carryforward: 0
        charitable_carryforward_used: 8_000
      expect: 8_000

    - name: "Combined current year and carryforward"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        charitable_deduction_before_carryforward: 12_000
        charitable_carryforward_used: 3_500
      expect: 15_500

    - name: "Large charitable donor with carryforward"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        charitable_deduction_before_carryforward: 75_000
        charitable_carryforward_used: 25_000
      expect: 100_000

    - name: "Zero charitable deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        charitable_deduction_before_carryforward: 0
        charitable_carryforward_used: 0
      expect: 0

    - name: "Small donor with minimal carryforward"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        charitable_deduction_before_carryforward: 500
        charitable_carryforward_used: 150
      expect: 650

documents.title: Charitable Contribution Carryforward
documents.text:
(1) Individuals.-- In the case of an individual, the deduction provided
in subsection (a) shall be limited as provided in the succeeding
subparagraphs.
(A) General rule.-- Any charitable contribution to--
(i) a church or a convention or association of churches,
(ii) an educational organization...
[public charities, 50%/60% limit organizations]
shall be allowed to the extent that the aggregate of such contributions
does not exceed 50 percent [60% under TCJA] of the taxpayer's
contribution base for the taxable year.
(B) [30% organizations - private non-operating foundations]
(C) Special limitation with respect to contributions... of certain
capital gain property.-- [30% limit for property to 50% orgs]
(D) Special limitation with respect to contributions of capital gain
property to organizations not described in subparagraph (A).--
[20% limit for property to 30% orgs]
documents.code:
text: """
(1) Individuals.-- In the case of an individual, the deduction provided
in subsection (a) shall be limited as provided in the succeeding
subparagraphs.
(A) General rule.-- Any charitable contribution to--
(i) a church or a convention or association of churches,
(ii) an educational organization...
[public charities, 50%/60% limit organizations]
shall be allowed to the extent that the aggregate of such contributions
does not exceed 50 percent [60% under TCJA] of the taxpayer's
contribution base for the taxable year.
(B) [30% organizations - private non-operating foundations]
(C) Special limitation with respect to contributions... of certain
capital gain property.-- [30% limit for property to 50% orgs]
(D) Special limitation with respect to contributions of capital gain
property to organizations not described in subparagraph (A).--
[20% limit for property to 30% orgs]
"""
variable percentage_limitations:
  imports: [26/62/a#adjusted_gross_income]
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Charitable Contribution Carryforward"
  description: "Excess contributions to carry forward per 26 USC 170(d)(1)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Contribution base is generally AGI for individuals
    agi = adjusted_gross_income
    # Calculate limits for each category
    cash_public_limit = agi * p.cash_to_public_charity
    property_public_limit = agi * p.property_to_public_charity
    cash_private_limit = agi * p.cash_to_private_foundation
    property_private_limit = agi * p.property_to_private_foundation
    # Overall limit
    overall = agi * p.overall_limit
    return overall
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Moderate income - overall limit at 60% of AGI"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 100_000
      expect: 60_000
      # overall = 100_000 * 0.60 = 60_000

    - name: "High income taxpayer - large contribution limit"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 500_000
      expect: 300_000
      # overall = 500_000 * 0.60 = 300_000

    - name: "Low income - small contribution limit"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 30_000
      expect: 18_000
      # overall = 30_000 * 0.60 = 18_000

    - name: "Zero income - zero contribution limit"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
      expect: 0
      # overall = 0 * 0.60 = 0

    - name: "Very high income donor"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 1_000_000
      expect: 600_000
      # overall = 1_000_000 * 0.60 = 600_000

    - name: "Median income household"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        adjusted_gross_income: 75_000
      expect: 45_000
      # overall = 75_000 * 0.60 = 45_000

documents.title: Pre-2018 NOL Carryforward
documents.text:
26 USC § 172 - Net Operating Loss Deduction

(a) Deduction allowed.—There shall be allowed as a deduction for the taxable year
an amount equal to the aggregate of the net operating loss carryovers and net
operating loss carrybacks to such year.

(b) Net operating loss carrybacks and carryovers.—
(1) In general.—A net operating loss for any taxable year shall be a net
operating loss carryback to the extent provided in subsection (b)(1) and a
net operating loss carryforward.

(2) 80% limitation.—In the case of a net operating loss arising in a taxable
year beginning after December 31, 2017, the amount of such loss which may be
taken into account under subsection (a) shall not exceed 80% of taxable income
(computed without regard to the deduction allowable under this section).
documents.code:
text: """
26 USC § 172 - Net Operating Loss Deduction

(a) Deduction allowed.—There shall be allowed as a deduction for the taxable year
an amount equal to the aggregate of the net operating loss carryovers and net
operating loss carrybacks to such year.

(b) Net operating loss carrybacks and carryovers.—
(1) In general.—A net operating loss for any taxable year shall be a net
operating loss carryback to the extent provided in subsection (b)(1) and a
net operating loss carryforward.

(2) 80% limitation.—In the case of a net operating loss arising in a taxable
year beginning after December 31, 2017, the amount of such loss which may be
taken into account under subsection (a) shall not exceed 80% of taxable income
(computed without regard to the deduction allowable under this section).
"""

input nol_carryforward_pre_2018:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Pre-2018 NOL Carryforward"
  description: "Net operating losses originating before 2018, not subject to 80% limitation"
  default: 0

input nol_carryforward_post_2017:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Post-2017 NOL Carryforward"
  description: "Net operating losses originating after 2017, subject to 80% limitation"
  default: 0

input farming_loss_carryback:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Farming Loss Carryback"
  description: "Farming loss available for 2-year carryback under Section 172(b)(1)(B)"
  default: 0

input is_farming_business:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "Farming Business"
  description: "Whether taxpayer has a farming business per Section 263A(e)(4)"
  default: false

input current_year_farming_loss:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Current Year Farming Loss"
  description: "Net operating loss from farming business in current year"
  default: 0

input prior_nol_deduction_claimed:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Prior NOL Deduction Claimed"
  description: "NOL deduction amount claimed in current year (for modification calculation)"
  default: 0

documents.title: Net Operating Loss Deduction
documents.text:
(a) Deduction allowed.-- There shall be allowed as a deduction for the
taxable year an amount equal to--
(1) the aggregate of the net operating loss carryovers to such year,
plus the net operating loss carrybacks to such year, and
(2) in the case of a net operating loss for a taxable year beginning
after December 31, 2017, such deduction shall not exceed 80 percent
of taxable income (determined without regard to the deduction
allowed under this section).
documents.code:
text: """
(a) Deduction allowed.-- There shall be allowed as a deduction for the
taxable year an amount equal to--
(1) the aggregate of the net operating loss carryovers to such year,
plus the net operating loss carrybacks to such year, and
(2) in the case of a net operating loss for a taxable year beginning
after December 31, 2017, such deduction shall not exceed 80 percent
of taxable income (determined without regard to the deduction
allowed under this section).
"""
variable nol_deduction:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Net Operating Loss Deduction"
  description: "Total NOL deduction from carryforwards and carrybacks per 26 USC 172(a)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Aggregate of:
    # (1) Pre-2018 NOL carryforwards (no 80% limit)
    # (2) Post-2017 NOL carryforwards (80% limit applies)
    # (3) Farming loss carrybacks (special 2-year carryback)
    pre_2018_deduction = nol_deduction_pre_2018
    post_2017_deduction = nol_deduction_post_2017
    # Farming carryback applies to prior years, not current year deduction
    # For current year, we only use carryforwards
    farming_carryback = farming_loss_carryback
    total = pre_2018_deduction + post_2017_deduction + farming_carryback
    # Ensure deduction does not exceed taxable income
    # (Should already be handled by component calculations)
    return min(total, max(0, taxable_income))
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "NOL deduction with pre and post-TCJA carryforwards"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 30_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 80000
    - name: "NOL deduction capped at taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 40_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 60_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 50000
    - name: "NOL deduction with farming carryback"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 60_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 10_000
      expect: 70000
    - name: "No NOL deduction with zero carryforwards"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "NOL deduction with large carryforwards exceeding income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 200_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 150_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 300_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 200_000
    - name: "NOL deduction with only farming carryback"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 75_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 50_000
      expect: 50_000
    - name: "NOL deduction with zero taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 100_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 25_000
      expect: 0
    - name: "NOL deduction with small amounts"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 5_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 2_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 1_500
        farming_loss_carryback: 500
      expect: 4_000

variable nol_deduction_claimed:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "NOL Deduction Claimed"
  description: "Whether taxpayer claims an NOL deduction in current year"
  formula: return nol_deduction > 0
  default: False
  tests:
    - name: "NOL deduction is claimed when deduction is positive"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 25_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "NOL deduction not claimed when deduction is zero"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: false
    - name: "NOL deduction claimed with post-2017 carryforward only"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 80_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 30_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "NOL deduction claimed with farming loss only"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 15_000
      expect: true

variable taxable_income_before_nol:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Taxable Income Before NOL Deduction"
  description: "Taxable income computed without NOL deduction"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # This is used for computing the 80% limitation
    return taxable_income + nol_deduction
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Taxable income before NOL with deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 75_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 25_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 100000
    - name: "Taxable income before NOL without deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 100_000
    - name: "Taxable income before NOL with large deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 40_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 60_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 100_000
    - name: "Taxable income before NOL with all component types"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 25_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 10_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 5_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 10_000
      expect: 50_000

variable amt_nol_deduction:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "AMT NOL Deduction"
  description: "NOL deduction for AMT purposes per Section 56(d)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # For AMT, NOL deduction generally limited to 80% of AMTI
    # (before NOL and QBID deductions)
    # This is similar to regular NOL limitation
    # For simplicity, use regular NOL deduction
    # Full implementation would recompute with AMTI
    return nol_deduction
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "AMT NOL deduction equals regular NOL deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 30_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 40_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 5_000
      expect: 75000
    - name: "AMT NOL deduction zero when no carryforwards"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 0
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "AMT NOL deduction with pre-2018 carryforward only"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 150_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 60_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 60_000
    - name: "AMT NOL deduction capped at taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 40_000
        nol_deduction_pre_2018: 25_000
        nol_deduction_post_2017: 30_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
      expect: 40_000

documents.title: NOL Carryback/Carryover
documents.text:
(b) Net operating loss carrybacks and carryovers.--
(1) Years to which loss may be carried.--
(A) General rule.-- A net operating loss for any taxable year--
(i) shall not be a net operating loss carryback to any taxable year
preceding the taxable year of such loss, and
(ii) shall be a net operating loss carryover to each taxable year
following the taxable year of the loss.
(B) Special rules for farming losses.--
(i) In general.-- In the case of any portion of a net operating
loss for the taxable year which is a farming loss, such loss
shall be a net operating loss carryback to each of the 2 taxable
years preceding the taxable year of such loss.
documents.code:
text: """
(b) Net operating loss carrybacks and carryovers.--
(1) Years to which loss may be carried.--
(A) General rule.-- A net operating loss for any taxable year--
(i) shall not be a net operating loss carryback to any taxable year
preceding the taxable year of such loss, and
(ii) shall be a net operating loss carryover to each taxable year
following the taxable year of the loss.
(B) Special rules for farming losses.--
(i) In general.-- In the case of any portion of a net operating
loss for the taxable year which is a farming loss, such loss
shall be a net operating loss carryback to each of the 2 taxable
years preceding the taxable year of such loss.
"""

parameter nol_limitation_rate:
  description: "80% limitation rate on NOL deduction for post-TCJA losses"
  unit: /1
  values:
    2018-01-01: 0.80

parameter farming_loss_carryback_years_param:
  description: "Number of years farming loss can be carried back"
  unit: years
  values:
    2018-01-01: 2

variable carryback_carryover:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Carryback/Carryover"
  description: "Net operating loss carryback or carryover deduction for the current year"
  imports:
    - 26/63/a#taxable_income
    - 26/1#filing_status
    - 26/172#nol_carryforward_pre_2018
    - 26/172#nol_carryforward_post_2017
    - 26/172#farming_loss_carryback
    - 26/172#is_farming_business
    - 26/172#current_year_farming_loss
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Total available NOL carryforward
    total_nol = nol_carryforward_pre_2018 + nol_carryforward_post_2017
    # Apply 80% limitation to post-2017 losses only
    if nol_carryforward_post_2017 > 0:
        # Post-TCJA NOLs limited to 80% of taxable income
        limited_amount = taxable_income * nol_limitation_rate
        post_2017_allowed = min(nol_carryforward_post_2017, max(0, limited_amount - nol_carryforward_pre_2018))
    else:
        post_2017_allowed = 0
    # Pre-2018 NOLs can offset 100% of taxable income
    pre_2018_allowed = min(nol_carryforward_pre_2018, max(0, taxable_income - post_2017_allowed))
    return min(total_nol, pre_2018_allowed + post_2017_allowed)
  default: 0

variable nol_carryforward_allowed:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "NOL Carryforward Allowed"
  description: "Whether NOL can be carried forward per 172(b)(1)(A)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Post-TCJA: NOLs can be carried forward indefinitely
    # No limitation period on carryforwards
    return True
  default: True
  tests:
    - name: "NOL carryforward always allowed post-TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 10_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 15_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "Carryforward allowed even with no NOL carryforwards"
      period: 2020
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "Carryforward allowed with large pre-TCJA carryforward"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 500_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 1_000_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "Carryforward allowed with negative taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -75_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 25_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: true

variable nol_carryback_allowed:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "NOL Carryback Allowed"
  description: "Whether NOL can be carried back (generally no for post-TCJA)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Post-TCJA: General carryback eliminated
    # Exception for farming losses under 172(b)(1)(B)
    return False
  default: False
  tests:
    - name: "General NOL carryback not allowed post-TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 20_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: false
    - name: "Carryback not allowed for business losses"
      period: 2022
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: false
    - name: "Carryback not allowed with large loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -500_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: false
    - name: "Carryback not allowed despite existing carryforwards"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 200_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 150_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: false

variable farming_loss_carryback_allowed:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "Farming Loss Carryback Allowed"
  description: "Whether farming loss qualifies for carryback per 172(b)(1)(B)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Farming losses may be carried back per 172(b)(1)(B)
    # Taxpayer must have a farming business and farming loss
    return is_farming_business and current_year_farming_loss > 0
  default: False
  tests:
    - name: "Farming carryback allowed with farming business and loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -30_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 30_000
      expect: true
    - name: "Farming carryback not allowed without farming business"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 50_000
      expect: false
    - name: "Farming carryback not allowed with business but no loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: false
    - name: "Farming carryback allowed with large farming loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -200_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 200_000
      expect: true
    - name: "Farming carryback not allowed with small positive income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 5_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: false

variable farming_loss_carryback_years:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Integer
  label: "Farming Loss Carryback Years"
  description: "Number of years farming loss can be carried back"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    if farming_loss_carryback_allowed:
        return farming_loss_carryback_years_param
    else:
        return 0
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Farming loss carryback 2 years when allowed"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -40_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 40_000
      expect: 2
    - name: "No carryback years when farming loss carryback not allowed"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Farming carryback 2 years with moderate loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -75_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: true
        current_year_farming_loss: 75_000
      expect: 2
    - name: "No carryback years for non-farming business"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 100_000
      expect: 0

variable total_nol_carryforward:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Total NOL Carryforward Available"
  description: "Total NOL carryforward from all prior years available for deduction"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Sum of pre-TCJA and post-TCJA NOL carryforwards
    # These are tracked separately due to different limitation rules
    return nol_carryforward_pre_2018 + nol_carryforward_post_2017
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Total NOL carryforward both pre and post TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 25_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 35_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 60000
    - name: "Total NOL only pre-TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 40_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 40000
    - name: "Total NOL only post-TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 75_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 50000
    - name: "No NOL carryforward"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Large NOL carryforward from both eras"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 1_000_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 500_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 750_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 1_250_000
    - name: "Small NOL carryforward amounts"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 10_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 1_500
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 2_500
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 4_000

variable nol_taxable_income_for_limitation:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Taxable Income for NOL Limitation"
  description: "Taxable income computed without NOL deduction for 80% limitation"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Use taxable income before NOL deduction
    # This creates a circular dependency that must be resolved iteratively
    # For practical purposes, we use taxable income plus any NOL already taken
    return max(0, taxable_income)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Taxable income for limitation purposes positive"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 125_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 125000
    - name: "Taxable income for limitation purposes capped at zero"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 100_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Taxable income for limitation with negative income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 75_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "High taxable income for limitation"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 2_000_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 500_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 2_000_000

variable nol_limitation_amount:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Limitation Amount"
  description: "Maximum NOL deduction based on 80% taxable income limitation"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Post-TCJA NOLs limited to 80% of taxable income
    # Pre-TCJA NOLs not subject to this limitation
    ti = nol_taxable_income_for_limitation
    return ti * nol_limitation_rate
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "80% limitation on taxable income of 100,000"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 80000
    - name: "80% limitation on taxable income of 50,000"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 60_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 40000
    - name: "80% limitation when taxable income is zero"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 20_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "80% limitation on high income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 1_000_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 900_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 800_000
    - name: "80% limitation with odd amount"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 75_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 100_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 60_000

variable nol_deduction_pre_tcja:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Pre-TCJA NOL Deduction"
  description: "NOL deduction from pre-TCJA losses (not subject to 80% limit)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    ti = nol_taxable_income_for_limitation
    available = nol_carryforward_pre_2018
    # Pre-TCJA NOLs can offset 100% of taxable income
    return min(available, ti)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Pre-TCJA NOL less than taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 30_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 30000
    - name: "Pre-TCJA NOL exceeds taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 40_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 80_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 40000
    - name: "Pre-TCJA NOL no deduction when zero taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 50_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Pre-TCJA NOL fully offsets income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 100_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 100_000
    - name: "Large pre-TCJA NOL with high income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 500_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 300_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 300_000

variable nol_deduction_post_tcja:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Post-TCJA NOL Deduction"
  description: "NOL deduction from post-TCJA losses (subject to 80% limit)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    ti = nol_taxable_income_for_limitation
    available = nol_carryforward_post_2017
    # First apply any pre-TCJA NOL
    remaining_ti = max(0, ti - nol_deduction_pre_tcja)
    # Post-TCJA NOLs limited to 80% of remaining taxable income
    limitation = remaining_ti * nol_limitation_rate
    return min(available, limitation)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL subject to 80% limitation"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 100_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 80000
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL less than 80% limit"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 50000
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL after pre-TCJA deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 40_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 100_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 48000
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL fully consumed by 80% limit after pre-TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 80_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 16_000
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL with zero pre-TCJA carryforward"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 200_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 200_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 160_000
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL completely blocked by pre-TCJA deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 50_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 100_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Post-TCJA NOL small remaining after pre-TCJA"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 90_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 25_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 8_000

variable nol_carryforward_remaining_pre_tcja:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Remaining Pre-TCJA NOL Carryforward"
  description: "Pre-TCJA NOL remaining after current year deduction"
  formula: return max(0, nol_carryforward_pre_2018 - nol_deduction_pre_tcja)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Pre-TCJA carryforward fully deducted"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 50_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 30_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Pre-TCJA carryforward partially used"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 30_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 50_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 20000
    - name: "Pre-TCJA carryforward zero, no deduction"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Large pre-TCJA carryforward exceeds income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 75_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 200_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 125_000
    - name: "Pre-TCJA carryforward with zero income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 100_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 0
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 100_000

variable nol_carryforward_remaining_post_tcja:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Remaining Post-TCJA NOL Carryforward"
  description: "Post-TCJA NOL remaining after current year deduction"
  formula: return max(0, nol_carryforward_post_2017 - nol_deduction_post_tcja)
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward fully deducted under 80% limit"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward limited by 80% rule"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 100_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 20000
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward unused with zero taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 75_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 75000
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward after pre-TCJA exhaustion"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 100_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 50_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 50_000
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward partially used"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 125_000
        filing_status: "married_filing_jointly"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 150_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 50_000
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward large amount remaining"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 50_000
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 500_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 460_000
    - name: "Post-TCJA carryforward with no income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 0
        filing_status: "single"
        nol_carryforward_pre_2018: 0
        nol_carryforward_post_2017: 200_000
        farming_loss_carryback: 0
        is_farming_business: false
        current_year_farming_loss: 0
      expect: 200_000

documents.title: Net Operating Loss
documents.text:
(c) Net operating loss defined.-- For purposes of this section, the term
'net operating loss' means the excess of the deductions allowed by this
chapter over the gross income. Such excess shall be computed with the
modifications specified in subsection (d).
documents.code:
text: """
(c) Net operating loss defined.-- For purposes of this section, the term
'net operating loss' means the excess of the deductions allowed by this
chapter over the gross income. Such excess shall be computed with the
modifications specified in subsection (d).
"""
input nol_defined:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean

variable net_operating_loss:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "Net Operating Loss"
  description: "Excess of deductions over gross income per 26 USC 172(c)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # NOL = negative taxable income (before NOL deduction), with modifications
    # Per 172(c), we compute the excess of deductions over income
    # with modifications from 172(d)
    modified_taxable_income = taxable_income + nol_modifications
    # NOL only exists when modified taxable income is negative
    if modified_taxable_income >= 0:
        return 0
    # Return the absolute value of the loss
    return -modified_taxable_income
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "NOL generated from negative modified taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: 50000
    - name: "NOL with modifications increasing loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -30_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 10_000
      expect: 40000
    - name: "No NOL with positive taxable income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 75_000
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "No NOL with break-even position"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -20_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 20_000
      expect: 0
    - name: "Large NOL from significant business loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -500_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: 500_000
    - name: "NOL with modifications reducing loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -100_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 30_000
      expect: 70_000
    - name: "Modifications completely offset loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -25_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 50_000
      expect: 0
    - name: "Small NOL from marginal loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -5_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: 5_000

variable has_net_operating_loss:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Boolean
  label: "Has Net Operating Loss"
  description: "Whether taxpayer has a net operating loss in the current year"
  formula: return net_operating_loss > 0
  default: False
  tests:
    - name: "Has NOL when net operating loss exists"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "No NOL when taxable income positive"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 150_000
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: false
    - name: "Has NOL with large loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -300_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 0
      expect: true
    - name: "No NOL when modifications wipe out loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -40_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 50_000
      expect: false
    - name: "Has NOL with modifications but still negative"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -75_000
        adjusted_gross_income: 0
        nol_modifications: 25_000
      expect: true

documents.title: NOL Modification - Prior NOL
documents.text:
26 USC 172(d) - Modifications

(d) Modifications.— The modifications referred to in this section are
as follows:

(1) Net operating loss deduction.— No net operating loss deduction
shall be allowed.

(2) Capital gains and losses of taxpayers other than corporations.—
(A) Losses from sales or exchanges of capital assets shall be
allowed only to the extent of gains from such sales or exchanges.
(B) Exclusions and deductions under section 1202.

(3) Deduction for personal exemptions.— No deduction shall be allowed
under section 151 (relating to personal exemptions).

(4) Nonbusiness deductions of taxpayers other than corporations.—
[Detailed modifications for nonbusiness deductions]

(5) Computation of deduction for dividends received, etc.— The
deductions allowed by sections 243 (relating to dividends received by
corporations), 244 (relating to dividends received on certain preferred
stock of public utilities), and 245 (relating to dividends received
from certain foreign corporations) shall be computed without regard
to section 246(b).

(6) Modifications related to real estate investment trusts.— In the
case of any taxable year for which part II of subchapter M applies to
the taxpayer— [REIT-specific rules apply]

(7) [Repealed by Tax Cuts and Jobs Act]

(8) Qualified business income.— Any deduction under section 199A
shall not be allowed.

(9) Deduction for foreign-derived intangible income.— The deduction
under section 250 shall not be allowed.

variable nol_modification_prior_nol:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - Prior NOL"
  description: "Add back prior year NOL deductions per 172(d)(1)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # When computing current year NOL, add back any NOL deduction taken
    # This prevents circular references and stacking of NOL deductions
    return prior_nol_deduction_claimed
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Add back NOL deduction from current year"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 40_000
      expect: 40000
    - name: "No modification when no NOL deduction claimed"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -30_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Large NOL deduction add-back"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -200_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 150_000
      expect: 150_000
    - name: "Small NOL deduction add-back"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -10_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 5_000
      expect: 5_000

variable nol_modification_capital_losses:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - Capital Losses"
  description: "Capital losses limited to capital gains per 172(d)(2)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Capital losses can only offset capital gains for NOL computation
    # Excess capital losses are not part of NOL
    net_capital = capital_gains - capital_losses
    # If net capital gain or no loss, no modification needed
    if net_capital >= 0:
        return 0
    # Disallow excess capital losses beyond what offset gains
    # Add back the excess loss that reduced taxable income
    excess_capital_loss = -net_capital
    # But only to extent losses exceeded gains
    if capital_losses > capital_gains:
        return excess_capital_loss
    else:
        return 0
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Add back excess capital losses beyond gains"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        capital_gains: 10_000
        capital_losses: 30_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 20000
    - name: "No modification when capital losses equal gains"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        capital_gains: 25_000
        capital_losses: 25_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "No modification when gains exceed losses"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 50_000
        capital_gains: 50_000
        capital_losses: 15_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Full capital loss modification with no gains"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 35_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 35_000
    - name: "Capital losses slightly exceed gains"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -60_000
        capital_gains: 20_000
        capital_losses: 25_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 5_000
    - name: "Large capital loss excess"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -100_000
        capital_gains: 10_000
        capital_losses: 100_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 90_000
    - name: "Net capital gain no modification"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 25_000
        capital_gains: 40_000
        capital_losses: 15_000
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0

variable nol_modification_exemptions:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - Exemptions"
  description: "Add back personal exemptions per 172(d)(3)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Personal exemptions are not allowed in computing NOL
    # Add them back (though suspended 2018-2025 by TCJA)
    return personal_exemption
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Add back personal exemptions (pre-TCJA)"

        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Multiple exemptions pre-TCJA family"
      period: 2016
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 16_200
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 16_200
    - name: "Large family exemption add-back"
      period: 2017
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -100_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 20_250
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 20_250

variable nol_modification_nonbusiness:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - Nonbusiness Deductions"
  description: "Limit nonbusiness deductions to nonbusiness income per 172(d)(4)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Simplified: For individuals, nonbusiness deductions (e.g., standard/itemized)
    # cannot create or increase an NOL beyond business losses
    # This is a complex calculation in practice; simplified here
    # The modification ensures only business losses generate NOL
    # Nonbusiness deductions (medical, state taxes, etc.) are limited
    # For now, return 0 as most individual NOLs are from business losses
    # Full implementation would track business vs. nonbusiness items
    return 0
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Nonbusiness modification simplified to zero"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -50_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Nonbusiness modification with positive income"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: 100_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0
    - name: "Nonbusiness modification with large loss"
      period: 2024
      inputs:
        taxable_income: -250_000
        capital_gains: 0
        capital_losses: 0
        personal_exemption: 0
        prior_nol_deduction_claimed: 0
      expect: 0

variable nol_modification_dividends:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - Dividends"
  description: "Adjustment for dividend-received deductions per 172(d)(5)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Per 172(d)(5): For corporations, compute dividends-received deduction
    # without regard to section 246(b) limitations during loss years
    # This allows full DRD even when it would create/increase a loss
    # For individuals, this doesn't apply
    return 0  # Simplified - full implementation would track corporate DRD
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Individual - no dividend modification"
      period: 2024
      inputs: {}
      expect: 0

  entity: TaxUnit

  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - REIT"
  description: "Adjustment for REIT income per 172(d)(6)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Per 172(d)(6): REITs apply special adjustments when computing NOL
    # Incorporates REIT-specific income modifications per section 857
    # For non-REIT taxpayers, this is zero
    return 0  # Simplified - full implementation would handle REIT rules
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Non-REIT - no modification"
      period: 2024
      inputs: {}
      expect: 0

# Note: 172(d)(7) was repealed by TCJA

variable nol_modification_qbi:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - QBI"
  description: "Add back section 199A QBI deduction per 172(d)(8)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Per 172(d)(8): QBI deduction under section 199A is not allowed
    # when computing the NOL - add it back
    return qbi_deduction
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Add back QBI deduction"
      period: 2024

        qbi_deduction: 25000

        qbi_deduction: 0

variable nol_modification_fdii:
  entity: TaxUnit
  period: Year
  dtype: Money
  unit: USD
  label: "NOL Modification - FDII"
  description: "Add back section 250 FDII deduction per 172(d)(9)"
  syntax: python
  formula: |
    # Per 172(d)(9): FDII/GILTI deduction under section 250 is not allowed
    # when computing the NOL - add it back (applies to corporations)
    return fdii_deduction
  default: 0
  tests:
    - name: "Add back FDII deduction"
      period: 2024

        fdii_deduction: 50000
      expect: 50000
